posts.post_content:
If I put this in my exalted EDH deck, will it's ability go on the stack? So I attack with it and have [Rafiq of the Many](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rafiq of the Many) in play. Since the Worm attacked alone, can I stack Rafiq's Exalted and double-strike, then put the Worm's "destroy all creatures" ability on top.
  
   
All creatures are nuked and I have an 8/8 double-striking beat down heading your way. Plus maybe a [Might of Oaks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Might of Oaks) to make it 15/15...
  
   
Or If I make them indestructible, my [Knight of New Alara](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight of New Alara ) makes him a 9/9, plus all the exalted goodness I can handle.
